LanguageData.SimpleFxSplashes.Settings.SizeMultiplier: Adjust how big the splash particles are.
LanguageData.SimpleFxSplashes.Settings.SplashRarity.D: Lowering this will spawn more splash particle, and increasing will make them rarer. This impacts performance.
LanguageData.SimpleFxSplashes.Settings.FilterNature.D: A reduction on natural cells (such as rough stone) allowed to splash rain. Only allow {0}% of natural tiles to splash rain. Increasing this impacts performance.
